document.full_text: as chinese paramilitary officers in sichuan province sought to detain monks, some tibetans trying to prevent their removal were fatally beaten, an advocacy group said.
document.title: reports of 2 tibetans killed by chinese officers
lines_and_colors: as chinese paramilitary officers in sichuan province sought to detain monks, some tibetans trying to prevent their removal were fatally beaten, an advocacy group said.
